 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּף‎</span>] **verb** ==move to and fro, wave, besprinkle== (Late Hebrew Hiph\`il, Pilpal ***wave, blow, fan***, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפָה‎</span> ***sift***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפָה‎</span> noun ***sieve*** (as Biblical Hebrew); [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Aph\`el as Biblical Hebrew; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bend, wave, shake***; [[BDB#Di|Di]] compare Ethiopic quadril. <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***distil, drop like dew***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sift***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַ֫פְתִּי מִשְׁכָּבִי מֹר וגו‎</span> [[Prov.7.17|Prov 7:17]] ***I have besprinkled my couch with myrrh***, etc. **Po\`lel** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנֹפֵף יָדוֺ הַר וגו‎</span> [[Isa.10.32|Isa 10:32]] ***he brandisheth his hand toward the mountain*** (on accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַר‎</span> compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:118f»§ 118f</sup>. [[BDB#Da|Da]]<sup>Synt. § 69, R 2</sup>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵנִיף‎</span> [[Josh.8.31|Josh 8:31]] +, 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵנַ֫פְתָּ‎</span> [[Exod.20.25|Exod 20:25]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72k»§ 72k</sup>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהֵנַפְתָּ֫‎</span> [[Exod.29.24|Exod 29:24]] + 3 t.; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲנִיפֹ֫תִי‎</span> [[Job.31.21|Job 31:21]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫נֶף‎</span> [[Lev.8.27|Lev 8:27]]; [[Num.8.21|Num 8:21]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנִיפֵ֫הוּ‎</span> [[Lev.8.29|Lev 8:29]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּנִיף‎</span> [[Deut.23.26|Deut 23:26]] + 2 t., etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָנִ֫יפוּ‎</span> [[Isa.13.2|Isa 13:2]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָנִיף‎</span> [[Isa.10.15|Isa 10:15]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַהֲנָפָה‎</span> [[Isa.30.28|Isa 30:28]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72z»§ 72z</sup> [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB 90</sup>, see also  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲנָחָה‎</span>), etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵנִיף‎</span> [[Isa.19.16|Isa 19:16]]; [[Zech.2.13|Zech 2:13]], etc.; — ***swing, wield, wave:*** — 

**1.** ***wield***, move tool to and fro in using it, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> of material: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי חֵרְבְּךָ הֵנַפְתָּ עָלֶיהָ‎</span> [[Exod.20.25|Exod 20:25]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), i.e. over stone, so [[Deut.27.5|Deut 27:5]]; [[Josh.8.31|Josh 8:31]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), and [[Deut.23.26|Deut 23:26]] a sickle ***thou shalt not wield over*** the standing grain of thy neighbour; absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנִיפוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.10.15|Isa 10:15]] against ***him that wieldeth it*** (i.e. a saw), and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּהָנִיף שֵׁבֶט‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאֶתמְֿרִימוֺ‎</span> v[[Isa.10.15|Isa 10:15]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתֿ‎</span>) ***like a rod's wielding him that lifteth it***.2.***Shake*** or ***wave*** the hand; 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***wave*** hand <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלהַֿמָּקוֺם‎</span> [[2Kgs.5.11|2Kgs 5:11]], in healing ceremony (i.e. probably toward sanctuary [[BDB#Kmp|Kmp]]<sup>Kau</sup>; &gt; ***toward the spot*** [where leprosy appears], so most). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span>, ***shake*** or ***brandish against***, [[Isa.11.15|Isa 11:15]]; [[Isa.19.16|Isa 19:16]]; [[Zech.2.13|Zech 2:13]] (all of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Job.31.21|Job 31:21]] [compare [[Eccl.12.18|Eccl 12:18]] (without <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>) in mockery]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***wave*** hand, as a signal, [[Isa.13.2|Isa 13:2]].


**3.** ***swing*** to and fro <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנָפַת‎</span>,***in a sieve***, [[Isa.30.28|Isa 30:28]] (figurative, of nations).


**4.** Oft. technical term in P ([[BDB#H|H]]), of rite in which originally the priest lifted his share of offering and ***waved*** it, i.e. moved it toward altar and back, in token of its presentation to God and its return by him to priest: in [[BDB#H|H]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהֵנִיף אֶתהָֿעֹמֶר לִפְנֵי י‎</span> [[Lev.23.11|Lev 23:11]]a compare v[[Lev.23.11|Lev 23:11]]b; v[[Lev.23.12|Lev 23:12]], also v[[Lev.23.20|Lev 23:20]] (on text see [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Dr-Wh|Dr-Wh]]<sup>Hpt</sup>); in [[BDB#P|P]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהֵנַפְתָּ֫ אֹתוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּנוּפָה לִפְנֵי י‎</span> [[Exod.29.26|Exod 29:26]], so [[Lev.7.30|Lev 7:30]]; [[Lev.8.29|Lev 8:29]]; [[Lev.10.15|Lev 10:15]] (object omitted) [[Num.6.20|Num 6:20]] thus also Levites are set apart for service of the priests [[Num.8.11|Num 8:11]] ([[BDB#Di|Di]] strike out see ), v[[Num.8.13|Num 8:13]] v[[Num.8.21|Num 8:21]], compare v[[Num.8.14|Num 8:14]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי י‎</span> omitted); but same phr, of entire lamb, with oil, [[Lev.14.12|Lev 14:12]]; [[Lev.14.24|Lev 14:24]], and of offerings which were burnt, entirely [[Exod.29.24|Exod 29:24]] (compare v[[Exod.29.25|Exod 29:25]]), [[Lev.8.27|Lev 8:27]] (compare v[[Lev.8.28|Lev 8:28]]), or in part [[Num.5.25|Num 5:25]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵנִיף הַמִּנְחָה לִפְנֵי י‎</span>), — in these the original significance seems lost; so, clearly, of contributions for tabernacle, = ***offer*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵנִיף תְּנוּפַת זָהָב לְי‎</span> [[Exod.35.22|Exod 35:22]]. — compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּנוּפָה‎</span> below

**5.** ***Shed abroad*** (si vera lectio) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֶּשֶׁם נְדָבוֺת תָּנִיף‎</span> [[Ps.68.10|Ps 68:10]] ***bounteous rain thou didst shed abroad*** [compare ], but verb not wholly suitable; [[BDB#Lag|Lag]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּטִּיף‎</span>, yet this also questionable. **Hoph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוּנַף‎</span>, ***be waved***, [[Exod.29.27|Exod 29:27]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), passive of 

**Hiph\`il 4.**
